name: SpaceShifting: Deady or Not
description:
A submission for Ludum Dare 50.

Alone in your spaceship, you notice movement in the corner of your eye. One slow head turn later and you see it: wiggling legs protruding out of the nearest panel. You take a step closer, only to notice the panel next to it has developed eyes. Could this be the start an invasion?

Protect your ship from these unknown enemies as they slowly turn your spacecraft from a warm lovable home to metal sheeting with a heart of steel. But be warned, you are only delaying the inevitable...

Controls:
WASD - movement
Left mouse click - shoot
